statements: DELETE FROM word_frequencies WHERE word = 'apple' AND frequency > 10;
DELETE FROM DocumentInformation WHERE title = 'Sample Title' AND author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM AnalysisResults WHERE frequency < 10 AND document_id = 5;
DELETE FROM document_word WHERE document_id = 5 AND word_id = 10;
DELETE FROM doc_word WHERE word_id = 3 AND doc_id = 5;
DELETE FROM word_freq WHERE frequency < 10 AND word = 'example';
DELETE FROM visualization v USING analysis a WHERE v.analysis_id = a.analysis_id AND a.doc_id = 1;
